notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: P. Machado, J.R. Fernandes and P. Tavares produced the films. Structural and chemical charcaterizations by XRD, SEM, AFM and XPS were performed by M. Ros√°rio Soares, J.P.B. Silva, P. Tavares, J. Agostinho Moreira and F.G. Figueiras. R. Vilarinho, A. Almeida, P. Machado, S. Cardoso and J. Agostinho Moreira performed dielectric and polar characterizations. F.G. Figueiras, J. Agostinho Moreira and A. Almeida wrote the manuscript. The authors contributed equally in discussing the results and the manuscript.
